official_title: ENCORAFENIB/BINIMETINIB MASTER PROTOCOL: AN OPEN-LABEL CONTINUATION STUDY FOR PARTICIPANTS CONTINUING FROM ENCORAFENIB/BINIMETINIB CLINICAL STUDIES
inclusion_criteria:
* Any participant who is receiving study intervention and deriving clinical benefit (as determined by the principal investigator) in an encorafenib/binimetinib Parent Study, with no ongoing NCI CTCAE version 4.03 Grade â‰¥3 or intolerable Grade 2 AEs considered to be related to study treatment.
* Participants must agree to follow the reproductive criteria as outlined in the applicable Encorafenib/Binimetinib Continuation Sub-Study Protocol.
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Any medical reason that, in the opinion of the investigator or sponsor, precludes the participant from inclusion in the study.
